name: Days Inn and Suites Red Bluff

reviews.text: This place was terrible. I know that Days Inn is on the low end on price and quality, but one was particularly bad.
reviews.title: Awful location and facility

reviews.text: First is location: it is right on the freeway. The only thing separating this place from the freeway was a few feet of dirt, and a chain link fence. Then, right next door to it is an old abandoned motel with the windows boarded up. It gave me the creeps thinking someone might be in there doing illicit things.
reviews.title: Not visiting here again!!!!

reviews.text: The room was run down and not clean. The air conditioner was not big enough to cool the room adequately. When, I tried messing with the AC, the front of it fell off. The shower had some cheap plastic shower hose that was difficult to flex. But the coupe de grace for this place was finding cockroaches scurrying about on the carpet when I got up in the morning.
reviews.title: Not the best but definitely not the worst

reviews.text: Oh yes, they have a breakfast that starts a 7am, I got there at 7:03 and they were already out of coffee. They had cereal set out but no milk. I ended up going to the nearby gas station to get some coffee and something to eat.
reviews.title: Not impressed...run down. Wouldn't book again.

reviews.text: The one good thing is that the staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Beyond terrible.
